pages.text: Explore the depths of the Abyss, a dimension filled with unique adventures and dangers. Illuminated only by glowing magical blocks and the diverse array of flora, fungi, and fauna that inhabit it, this shadowy world holds countless secrets waiting to be uncovered.

To survive in this dangerous world, it's crucial to equip yourself with the best armor and tools. Protect yourself against the various creatures you'll encounter on your journey! Discover the secrets of building a portal to the Abyss dimension on the next page. Find out what materials you'll need and how to create this magical gateway. Start your journey to the Abyss now!

pages.title: Loran
pages.text: Take the first steps towards building a portal with Loran, a mysterious blue plant or ore that absorbs and stores light, converting it into various energies. With both helpful and harmful properties depending on how it is processed, Loran is a powerful resource for creating portals and harnessing its energy. Just be sure to handle it with caution!

To build the portal frame, gather Loran (a glowing blue plant or ore found in the end dimension), Obsidian (a durable material formed from cooled lava), and Crying obsidian (a rare variant with magical properties). Combine these to create unstable obsidian, a vital component for the frame. Handle it with care as unstable obsidian is volatile.
